attributes.action: Evaluate the pay structure of the Logistics companies with regards to minimum wage increases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Evaluate the pay structure of the Logistics companies with regards to minimum wage increases.Minimum wage increases yet HGV drivers who pay for a professional licence get reduced working hours and no increase. Before more 'amendments ' are made to our working week, let's look at the financial aspect also. We look for fair pay in the dwindling working week.A minimum wage for proffessional drivers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
